name: In The Asylum
description:
Welcome to the world of In The Asylum. This project was made for Animation for Game Design course at MassArt. This game is meant to exemplify my illustration and animation skills first and foremost.  As such, the story isn't well thought out  and it was made using a template. If you would like to hire me for a project you can contact me at narcidraws@gamil.com thank you! 

The story is that you play as a girl locked in an asylum but she experiences "hyper reality". I'd love to do more with this idea.

CONTROLS:

WASD - movement

SPACE - jump (hold to jump higher)

SHIFT - walk

The goal of the game is to get the green pill!
